H0.text: A supplier of 'apparent' website visitors using low-paid workers to visit websites to post false comments/reviews or generate fraudulent PPC advertising revenues is called a. Fake Traffic Generator

H1.text: A supplier of 'apparent' website visitors using low-paid workers to visit websites to post false comments/reviews or generate fraudulent PPC advertising revenues is called a. Review Mill

H2.text: A supplier of 'apparent' website visitors using low-paid workers to visit websites to post false comments/reviews or generate fraudulent PPC advertising revenues is called a. PPC Fraudster

H3.text: A supplier of 'apparent' website visitors using low-paid workers to visit websites to post false comments/reviews or generate fraudulent PPC advertising revenues is called a. Click Farm

A4.text: A click farm is a form of click fraud where a large group of low-paid workers are hired to click on links or buttons for the click fraudster

A5.text: Click farms are usually located in developing countries, such as China, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Egypt, Indonesia, the Philippines, and Bangladesh
